EmailTemplate.subject: More Accurate Technology Is Coming for You - The Engineers Are at It Again…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/operationjetset#anchor]]> Deep inside our innovation labs, the engineers at Honeywell are working on something legendary - something for GoDirect™ Flight Services that has been years in the making. What is it?
Technology that transforms the way you interface with aviation is burgeoning in our R&D lab.
Sign up to be one of the first to know and enter for a chance to see and use this brand-new technology first-hand. This is something you won’t want to miss!
If you have not signed up yet… you can get the first look and enter to win one of these ‘bragworthy’ prizes:
- Flying experience using the new technology with Honeywell’s flight test team on a test plane!
- 1-Year GoDirect Flight Planning subscription for FREE
- Honeywell swag bag of gifts
*Please see official sweepstakes details and rules HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/~/media/aerospace/files/contest-rules/contestrules.pdf]]>
SIGN UP FOR THE EARLY REVEAL <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/operationjetset#anchor]]>
Get the latest updates online and follow Honeywell Aerospace on social media with the hashtag #OperationJetSet.
Honeywell GoDirect Team
